Function Documentation

DataBuffer* makeExportGfxFeatureMap (  GfxFeatureMap *  map,
MapSettings *  mapSettings,
bool  singleDraw,
const DrawingProjection *  projection,
bool  initText = true
) 
 

Creates a Export version of a GfxFeatureMap.

Parameters:
map The GfxFeatureMap to export.
mapSettings The MapSettings if any, may be NULL.
bool singleDraw If the export map should contain duplicates for polygons that should be drawn twice.
bool initText If text should be initialized. Default true.
Returns:
A new DataBuffer with the export map, or NULL if bad input.

DataBuffer* makeExportScalableGfxFeatureMap (  GfxFeatureMap *  map,
MapSettings *  mapSettings,
bool  singleDraw,
bool  initText = true
) 
 

Creates a Export version of a GfxFeatureMap keeping all scalelevels.

Parameters:
map The GfxFeatureMap to export.
mapSettings The MapSettings if any, may be NULL.
bool singleDraw If the export map should contain duplicates for polygons that should be drawn twice.
bool initText If text should be initialized. Default true.
Returns:
A new DataBuffer with the export map, or NULL if bad input.
